Operation 'GetPrometheusMetrics' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves metrics from 1Password Connect specifically, explains the response format, notes authentication requirements, and provides context about use cases. This helps AI agents understand when to call this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Query server for exposed Prometheus metrics
data.current_description: See Prometheus documentation for a complete data model.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve Prometheus metrics from 1Password Connect server
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves Prometheus-formatted metrics from the 1Password Connect server. Returns metrics in Prometheus text exposition format including server health, API request statistics, and operational performance data. No authentication required. Useful for monitoring and observability integration with Prometheus or compatible monitoring systems.
data.reasoning: Original description is insufficient - it merely references external documentation without explaining what the operation does or what an AI agent should expect. The summary is generic and doesn't specify the API context. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves metrics from 1Password Connect specifically, explains the response format, notes authentication requirements, and provides context about use cases. This helps AI agents understand when to call this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'DeleteVaultItem' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable, but description is completely missing. Added details about permanence, required parameters, side effects (removal of associated data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes an Item from the specified Vault. Requires the Vault UUID and Item UUID. This operation cannot be undone and will remove all associated data including fields and files. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable, but description is completely missing. Added details about permanence, required parameters, side effects (removal of associated data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

message: Operation 'GetItemFiles' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and specific, but description is missing. Added context about what is returned (File metadata collection), clarified that content is not included, and referenced the separate content download endpoint to guide AI agents toward correct operation sequencing.

data.current_summary: Get all the files inside an Item
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all File objects associated with a specific Item in a Vault. Requires the Vault UUID and Item UUID. Returns a collection of File metadata including file IDs, names, sizes, and content types. Does not return file content; use the file content endpoint to download actual file data.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and specific, but description is missing. Added context about what is returned (File metadata collection), clarified that content is not included, and referenced the separate content download endpoint to guide AI agents toward correct operation sequencing.

data.current_summary: Get the details of a File
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed metadata for a specific File within an Item. Requires Vault UUID, Item UUID, and File UUID. Returns File object containing properties such as ID, name, size, content type, and creation/modification timestamps. Does not return file content; use the file content endpoint to download the actual file data.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added specificity about what metadata is returned and clarified the distinction between metadata retrieval and content download to help AI agents understand the operation's scope and when to chain with content download operations.

data.current_summary: Get the content of a File
data.description_suggestion: Downloads the actual content/binary data of a File stored within an Item. Requires Vault UUID, Item UUID, and File UUID. Returns the file's binary content with appropriate Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers for proper client handling. The response body contains the raw file data.

data.description_suggestion: Performs a lightweight liveness check on the 1Password Connect server. Requires no authentication. Returns a 200 OK response if the server is operational. Useful for monitoring server availability and connection health without requiring credentials.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and domain-appropriate, but description is missing. Added context about authentication requirements (none), expected response, and use case for monitoring to help AI agents understand when to invoke this operation for health checks.

message: Operation 'GetServerHealth' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (health report with dependency states), referenced the ServiceDependency schema for consistency, clarified authentication requirements, and explained the use case to help AI agents understand this is a comprehensive health check beyond simple liveness.

data.current_summary: Get state of the server and its dependencies.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive health status of the 1Password Connect server and all registered service dependencies. Returns a health report including server operational state and the status of each dependency (as defined by ServiceDependency schema). Useful for monitoring overall system health and identifying dependency issues. Requires no authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added details about what is returned (health report with dependency states), referenced the ServiceDependency schema for consistency, clarified authentication requirements, and explained the use case to help AI agents understand this is a comprehensive health check beyond simple liveness.
